page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: Labour, Liberal & Conservative Associations meet in Abington & Linton. The Womens Institute has branches in Abington, Linton & Hildersham. There is a youth club at Linton & a new one has just been started in Abington. Beavers, Cubs, Scuts, Brownies & Guides meet weekly in Abington & Linton. All have uniforms with specific colours, e.g. Guides have blue shirts with yellow ties. All groups have mottos and promises. All Leaders have their own pack names. Scouts, Cubs & Guides go camping, sometimes abroad, and have their own equipment. All these Groups help to raise money for charity.
